msbt.message: Wondering why I'm not using an umbrella on a day like today?It's because I'm a frog! C'mon, don't make me ribbit for you. Take my word for it!
Hey, I know it's raining, but don't let that put a damper on your day.Like, at least rain sounds good! Unlike some weather I can think of. Looking at you, wind!
Rain got you down? I know—it's terrible for those of us with elaborate hairstyles. But look on the bright side. It's amazing for filming music videos and getting headshots taken!
Do you ever notice all the gentle noise that rain makes as it falls?It's just this kind ofpleasant nonsense. Not unlike a classic rant. Ha HA!
Ahh, isn't the fresh snow so pretty? It's perfect and purejust like my singing voice
on ice is just a different place, isn't it? Everything feels so magical!
Do you think the snow is gonna stick? I want to go sledding!
Wow, the snow is really coming down heavy right nowIt's almost like the whole island is a sound stageand I'm here for it with my one-man show!
The fresh snow is so beautiful, but it gets dirty so quicklyI don't have anything more profound to say. Wow, this is a LOT of snow, though.
I'm kind of an indoor guy, but on a day like today?<10_4 /> I'm outside ALL day long. Or at least as long as my sunscreen says I can stay out!
Ugh, the sky isn't cooperating with me today. I need good lighting for some selfies!
Oh manthe sky almost seems like it's about to cry!Go on, clouds. Let it all out! Rain down your tears and wash clean! Too much? Or not enough?
Don't worry—this gloomy weather won't last forever. We'll be sipping in the sun soon!
Ooh, it's cherry blossom season! C'mon, let's make some blossom angels, !
Out for a late-night walk, eh?
I, too, was drawn outside by the mysterious and otherworldly call of after dark Just kidding. I had restless legs, so I had to get out and stretch 'em. Ha HA!
Same here. It was too early to go to bed, and too late totake a nap.So I went with plan C—walk around humming to myself.
When you want to get lost in thought, this is the time of night to do it
You know you can always come talk to me about anything, right?Like, if you don't know what kind of socks to wear with faux alligator boots. <10_4 />The answer is no socks!
Oh, but seriously, we can talk about anything. It doesn't have to be sock related.
Oh, but seriously, we can talk about anything. It doesn't have to be sock related.
Ahh, what a gorgeous day!<10_4 /> I love knowing that wherever I go, I will be well-lit.
This would be the perfect day for a photo shoot on the beach Just me, my camera, and my pouty lips!
I'm gonna have to step up my laundry game if I want to wear this every time it's sunny
Speaking of special clothes, what's your laundry routine? Any special detergent or fragrance? No reason for asking, except I'm thinking of releasing my own line of fabric softener.
So, what's your favorite weather? You a sun person? A cloud kid? A rain reveler?
Ha HA! I just made all of those up. But yeah, I like a nice sunny day. It's just classic weather, you know?
I don't normally like the rain, but every now and then it's perfect.Like, if you need to look up into the sky sadly, or run after someone in slow motion, it's the best!
Ooh! I forgot one of the best ones. Snow! It makes feel like a movie set.
Whoa, check out the sky! It's crystal clear, with a 100 percent chance of shooting stars later on. I'm gonna set up a chair and just look up—like the sky is my own personal two-billion-inch HDTV.
You can just tell it's gonna be a great night for stargazing, can't you?I mean actual stars in the actual sky! Not, you know, celebrities.
Aww, look at that rainbow. It's like a magical bridge coming down from the sky Now, I know there's no pot of gold at the end, but there's gotta be SOMETHING, right?
Look at that! Not one, not two, not three Oh, wait. Two. There are two rainbows! What is it that they say about a double rainbow? That it brings you double the fortune? Wellthey SHOULD say that

It's one of those cold, clear days where nature can really put on a show, . If I were a weatherman, I'd say there's a good chance for something spectacular in the sky later. Hey, maybe I should be a weatherman!

Look, ! Up at the sky!Have you ever seen such a beautiful curtain of light? The way it moves gracefully, like a dancer , . I'll never forget this day. The day I realized the sky is a better dancer than me.
Good to see you, . I mean, I can't actually see you all that well, given the fog. Wait, that IS you, isn't it?
Wow, nature's really putting on a show for us, huh?If you get scared, don't hesitate to leap into my arms!I won't be able to protect you in any way, but it might look cool.
If you're gonna wish upon a shooting star, you've gotta be quick. BecauseZOOM! They don't last. Ohso THAT'S why they said that about my singing career
It's been so nice and clear—I've been looking forward to this meteor shower all day! Ha HA! I didn't even have to wish upon a falling star for my wish to see falling stars come true!

Did you make a wish yet?Move  to look up and press  while the shooting stars are going by to make a wish.Take your time, there are plenty of stars to go around, .When the time is right, focus on one star and send all your energy to it!<10_4 /> Results not guaranteed.
